sentence: The  attackers  killed  1,200  people  and  took  about  240  individuals  hostage,  according  to  Israel  â€”  shaking  the  country's  sense  of  security  to  its  core.

Israel's  military  response,  with  an  air,  ground  and  sea  assault  on  Gaza,  has  killed  more  than  23,900  Palestinians,  health  officials  in  Gaza  say,  and  has  left  much  of  the  territory  in  ruins.
Its  military  says  it  has  killed  Hamas  officials  and  thousands  of  fighters.

Israel's  effort  to  dismantle  Hamas'  tunnel  network  and  other  military  infrastructure  has  relied  on  airstrikes  that  have  killed  and  injured  civilians  and  have  left  Gaza  City  in  ruins.
Palestinian  officials  say  some  70%  of  the  dead  are  women  and  children.
Go  underground  and  fight  Hamas,"  said  Mohammad  Hamdan,  30,  as  he  cleaned  up  rubble  after  an  Israeli  airstrike  that  leveled  his  neighbor's  home  and  left  several  dead.  "
Israel  also  claims  to  have  killed  many  top  Hamas  commanders  and  as  many  as  8,000  Hamas  fighters.
Since  the  start  of  their  ground  operation  in  Gaza  in  October,  at  least  186  soldiers  have  been  killed  and  1,085  injured,  according  to  the  Israeli  military.
